snippet: Lance Armstrong admitted using performance-enhancing drugs in a TV interview set to air Thursday, and he plans to testify against people who knew about his doping.
abstract: Lance Armstrong admits to using performance-enhancing drugs in soon-to-be aired interview with Oprah Winfrey, though it remains unclear how forthcoming he was about extent of his doping program; is said to be planning to testify against several powerful people in cycling world who knew about his doping and possibly facilitated it.
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong admitted using performance-enhancing drugs in a TV interview set to air Thursday, and he plans to testify against people who knew about his doping.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong Admits Doping, and Says He Will Testify Against Cycling Officials
headline.main: Armstrong Admits Doping, and Says He Will Testify
